page.title: 07Orchard Park Estate - Ideal?
page.content: Orchard Park Estate was planned in the early 1960s and built in the late 1960s and early 1970s. {Dream houses } were built for people moved from the damp and decaying terraces of the 19th century inner city suburbs. Very high density modern terraces with small gardens, coupled with a dozen or so high and medium rise tower blocks has allowed the feeling of open space once away from the houses. Grassed hillocks and generous rose beds along the main roads and around the under- passes give an air of freshness. No industry nor chimneys pollute the air near to the open countryside. Four{ {villages, the Shaws, the Thorpes, the {Danes and the Courts}each have a primary school, and no through traffic is allowed as the access roads are all cul-de-sacs for motor traffic. The early day tenants were quite happy.
